texts.biography: Master of the rune of equality, Inti is a priestess and passionate scholar of civilizations. What intrigues him most are the peculiarities of a people that unbalance the powers of an era. As far as possible she tries to balance this nature cheating.
texts.name: Inti

specialty.description: Negates morale, luck and all immunities. Permits mixed army.
specialty.name: Equality Rune
specialty.tooltip: Negates morale, luck and all immunities. Permits mixed army. Starts with Forgetfulness
